attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Kang attacks you, either place 1 threat on the main scheme, or he gets +2 ATK for this attack.
name: Kang (The Conqueror)
text: Toughness When Defeated: Advance the main scheme to stage 2 at the end of the phase.

name: Kang (Immortus)
text: Toughness. This villain cannot take damage while a minion is in play. When Defeated: Remove the Chronopolis from the game. At the end of the phase, join another game area.

name: Kang (Iron Lad)
text: Retaliate 1. Toughness. When Defeated: Remove Inexorable Fate from the game. At the end of the phase, join another game area.

attack_text: This villain gets +1 ATK for each obligation in play.
name: Kang (Rama-Tut)
text: Toughness. When Defeated: Remove the Realm of Rama-Tut from the game. At the end of the phase, join another game area.

name: Kang (Scarlet Centurion)
text: Toughness. When Defeated: Remove The Present Future War from the game. At the end of the phase, join another game area.

attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Kang attacks you, either place 1 threat on the main scheme, or he gets +2 ATK for this attack.
name: Kang (The Conqueror)
text: Toughness. When Defeated: The players win the game.

back_text: Contents: Kang (I), each Kang (II), and Kang (III). Kang and Standard encounter sets. One modular encounter set (Temporal). Setup: Set each Kang (II), Kang (III), and Kang's Dominion side scheme aside. remove each player's obligation cards from the game. Shuffle the encounter deck.
flavor: Kang believes that by defeating Earth's mightiest heroes, the rest of the planet will submit to his rule.
name: Kang's Arrival
text: When Revealed: Deal each player an encounter card. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

back_flavor: Kang reels back, but saves himself by separating the heroes through time and space.
back_text: When Revealed: Place 1 acceleration token here for each side scheme in play, then discard each side scheme. Each player reveals a random stage 3A in turn oder. Remove any unused stage 3 schemes from the game.
name: The Master of Time
text: Forced Interrupt: When an acceleration token would be placed on another scheme, place it here instead. Players cannot join this game area unless there are no other game areas remaining. When all the players have joined this game area, advanced to stage 4A.

back_text: When Revealed: Create your own game area and place this scheme in it. Add Kang (Immortus) to the game area and deal yourself an encounter card.
name: The Chronopolis
text: Forced Response: After this stage is complete, place 1 set-aside Kang's Dominion facedown under stage 4A. At the end of the phase, remove Kang (Immortus) and this stage from the game and combine your game area with another game area. If all the players at this stage are defeated, this stage is complete.

back_text: When Revealed: Create your own game area and place this scheme in it. Add Kang (Iron Lad) to the game area and deal yourself an encounter card.
name: Inexorable Fate
text: Forced Response: After this stage is completed, place 1 set-aside Kang's Dominion facedown under stage 4A. At the end of the phase, remove Kang (Iron Lad) and this stage from the game and combine your game area with another game area. If all the players at the stage are defeated, this stage is completed.

back_text: When Revealed: Create your own game area and place this scheme in it. Add Kang (Rama-Tut) to the game area and deal yourself an encounter card.
name: The Realm of Rama-Tut
text: Forced Response: After this stage is completed, place 1 set-aside Kang's Dominion facedown under stage 4A. At the end of the phase, remove Kang (Rama-Tut) and this stage from the game and combine your game area with another game area. If all the players at this stage are defeated, this stage is completed.

back_text: When Revealed: Create your own game area and place this scheme in it. Add Kang (Scarlet Centurion) to the game area and deal yourself an encounter card.
name: The Present Future War
text: Forced Response: After this stage is completed, place 1 set-aside Kang's Dominion facedown under stage 4A. At the end of the phase, remove Kang (Scarlet Centurion) and this stage from the game and combine your game area with another game area. If all the players at this stage are defeated, this stage is completed.

back_flavor: You used your enemy's technology to reunite in the present day, just in time to counter Kang's assault on Earth.
back_text: When Revealed: Reveal Kang (III) and add him to the game area. Reveal each face down Kang's Dominion under this stage.
name: Kang's Wrath
text: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck, discard pile, and set-aside area for their nemesis minion and puts it into play engaged with them. Shuffle the encounter deck. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

flavor: "Put away your childish weapons! They are no more than toys to me!" - Kang
illustrator: Frank D Armatta, Karl Kazel, & Jorge Molina
name: Temporal Shield
text: Attach to Kang. Forced Interrupt: When Kang is attacked, discard Temporal Shield → prevent all damage from this attack and deal 1 damage to the attacker. (Max 1 per attack.)

attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Kang attacks, the attack gains overkill. If this attack damages a hero, that hero is stunned. After this attack, discard Future Weapon.
flavor: "Like myself, you know that combat means something, and honor more~" - Kang
name: Future Weapon
text: Attach to Kang.

illustrator: Frank D. Armata, Karl Kazel, & Jorge Molina
name: Frozen in Time
text: Attach to your identity. Forced Interrupt: When attached character would ready, discard this card instead.

boost_text: Give Kang a tough status card.
name: Macrobots
text: Guard. Retaliate 1.

flavor: "History is made! Made by the deeds of the strong! The brave! And destiny is forged!" - Kang
illustrator: Alvin Lee, Terry Pallot, & Val Staples
name: Weakened
text: Forced Response: After you use a basic hero power, take 1 damage. Alter-Ego Action: Discard a [physical] resource from your hand → discard this obligation.

illustrator: K Janson, T. Palmer, J Romita Jr., & S.D. White
name: Stolen Memories
text: When Revealed: Place the top 8 cards of your deck facedown under this card. Alter-Ego Action: Discard a [mental] resource from your hand → discard this obligation. (Discard each facedown card under this obligation.)

flavor: "Greater men than you have trembled at my name. Lesser men have fainted at its mention!" - Kang
illustrator: Jim Cheung, John Dell, & Justin Pansor
name: Depowered
text: You cannot play hero-specific cards. Alter-Ego Action: Discard a hero-specific card from your hand → discard this obligation.

illustrator: Alvin Lee, Terry Pallott, & Val Staples
name: Time-Travel Hijinks
text: When Revealed: Discard the highest-cost card you control, then place it facedown under this card. Alter-Ego Action: Discard a [energy] resource from your hand → discard this obligation.(Discard each facedown card under this obligation.)

illustrator: Jim Cheung, John Dell, & Justin Pentor
name: Corrupted Timestream
text: Players cannot trigger "Alter-Ego Action" abilities on obligations. When Revealed: Each player must either discard 1 random card from hand, or place 2 threat here.

flavor: "The future belongs to Kang! To Kang!" - Kang
name: Kang's Dominion
text: Kang cannot take damage. When Defeated: Deal the player who defeated this scheme an encounter card.

name: Pinned Down
text: When Revealed: Place 2 threat here for each obligation in play.

name: Rampage
text: When Defeated: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the player who defeated this scheme.

illustrator: Frank D'Armata, Karl Kazel, Jorge Molina
name: Energy Blast
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Discard an ally or support you control. If you cannot, this card gains surge. When Revealed (Hero): Kang attacks you.

flavor: "It is the conquerors who change the world." - Kang
name: Manipulated Timestream
text: When Revealed: Discard each event from your hand. If no events are discarded this way, this card gains surge.

boost_text: This card gains [boost] for each obligation in your play area.
name: Time-Travel Tactics
text: Surge. When Revealed: Each player takes 1 indirect damage for each obligation in their play area.

illustrator: Sunny Gho, Jay Leisten,& Steve McNiven
name: Past Machinations
text: Incite 1. (Place 1 threat on the main scheme when this card is revealed.)When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for a different obligation and reveals it. Shuffle the encounter deck.

name: Ancient Warrior
text: Quickstrike.

attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Chitauri Soldier attacks you, discard the top card of the encounter deck → take indirect damage equal to the number of boost icons on that card.
name: Chitauri Soldier
Tyrannosaurus Rex
text: Toughness.

name: Time Portal
text: Forced Interrupt: When this scheme is defeated, shuffle it into the encounter deck instead of discarding it.

boost_text: Exhaust a character you control. Give this enemy another boost card.
name: Apocryphus
text: When Revealed: Discard an ally or support you control.

boost_text: Give this enemy a tough status card and another boost card.
name: Deathunt 9000
text: Toughness. Villainous. (When this minion activates, give it a boost card.)

boost_text: Take 1 damage. Give this enemy another boost card.
name: Sir Raston
text: Guard. Retaliate 1.

boost_text: Give this enemy 2 more boost cards.
name: Terminatrix
text: Quickstrike.

boost_text: Discard 1 random card from your hand. Give this enemy another boost card.
name: Wildrun
text: When Revealed: Discard 1 random card from your hand.

name: The Anachronauts
text: When Defeated: Shuffle each [[Temporal]] card in the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck.

name: Kang's Chosen
text: Incite 1. (When revealed, place 1 threat on the main scheme.) When Revealed: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a [[Temporal]] minion is discarded. Reveal that minion.

name: Kang (Master of Time)
text: Toughness. Villainous. (When this minion activates, give it a boost card.) Kang (Master of Time) gets +1 SCH and +1 ATK for each obligation in your play area.

name: Time-Displaced Soldier
text: Incite 1. Surge.

name: Fear of Kang
text: You cannot attack Kang. Alter-Ego Action: Discard a random card from your hand → discard this obligation.

name: Light of Centuries Sphere
text: When Defeated: Discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with the player who defeated this scheme.

illustrator: Kieron Daye, Rick Remender, & Tom Smith
name: Ancient Grudge
text: When Revealed: Kang (Master of Time) activates against you. If Kang (Master of Time) is not in play, search the encounter deck and discard pile for Kang (Master of Time) and put him into play engaged with you. Shuffle the encounter deck.
